edu.wpi.cs.wpisuitetng.network

Class Network

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.wpi.cs.wpisuitetng.network.Network
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    MockNetwork, MockNetwork

    public class Network
extends java.lang.Object
    Singleton for managing Network configuration.

    • Method Detail

      • makeRequest

        public Request makeRequest(java.lang.String path,
                  HttpMethod requestMethod)
        Makes a Request using the defaultNetworkConfiguration, the given path, and the given requestMethod.
        Parameters:
        path - The core API subpath to make a request to.
        requestMethod - The requestMethod to use.
        Returns:
        A Request.
        Throws:
        java.lang.RuntimeException - If there is an error using the configured URL.
        java.lang.NullPointerException - If the requestMethod is null or there is a configuration error.

      • setDefaultNetworkConfiguration

        public void setDefaultNetworkConfiguration(NetworkConfiguration config)
                                    throws java.lang.NullPointerException
        Sets the default NetworkConfiguration.
        Parameters:
        config - The new default NetworkConfiguration.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - If the config parameter that has been passed is null.

      • initNetwork

        public static void initNetwork(Network network)
        Replaces the Network instance with the provided instance. This method can be used to replace instance with subclasses of Network for testing purposes.
        Parameters:
        network - the new Network instance

      • getDefaultNetworkConfiguration

        public NetworkConfiguration getDefaultNetworkConfiguration()
        Returns a copy of the default NetworkConfiguration.
        Returns:
        The default NetworkConfiguration.
        Throws:
        java.lang.RuntimeException - if the defaultNetworkConfiguration is null.

      • getInstance

        public static Network getInstance()
        Returns the singleton instance of Network.
        Returns:
        The singleton instance of Network.
